name: A Grimoire's Tale
description:
Wake up bookie, the evil wizard has returned to steal the secrets of magic from the library! He has corrupted the creatures in the halls, and you're the only one who can stop him!

Guide bookie on his quest to take down the wizard in this action-deckbuilder by slinging spells to take down your foes. You can summon splitting ice, fast flame, and even a giant rock to take down enemies, or combine them together for even greater effects! The possibilities are endless!

Can you stop the evil wizard at the end of the library?
